definitions.definition: A strip of fabric which has been fluted or pleated .
A small ruff of fluted or pleated fabric worn at neck or wrist .
A pile of arched tiles, used to catch and retain oyster spawn.

main_definition: A strip of fabric which has been fluted or pleated .
secondary_definitions: A small ruff of fluted or pleated fabric worn at neck or wrist .
A pile of arched tiles, used to catch and retain oyster spawn.
